licence_overview:
To handle, produce, use or store dangerous substances you may need to notify the [Health and Safety Executive (HSE)](http://www.hse.gov.uk/aboutus/index.htm "Health and Safety Executive"){:rel="external"} and your area's environment agency. 

* [Environment Agency](http://www.environment-agency.gov.uk/ "Health and Safety Executive"){:rel="external"} in England and Wales
* [Scottish Environment Protection Agency (SEPA)](http://www.sepa.org.uk/ "Scottish Environment Protection Agency"){:rel="external"}
* [Northern Ireland Environment Agency (NIEA)](http://www.doeni.gov.uk/niea// "Northern Ireland Environment Agency"){:rel="external"}

*[HSE]: Health & Safety Executive
*[SEPA]: Scottish Environment Protection Agency
*[NIEA]: Northern Ireland Environment Agency
*[HSE]: Health & Safety Executive
licence_short_description: To handle, produce, use or store dangerous substances, you may need to notify the authorities
overview: To handle, produce, use or store dangerous substances, you may need to notify the Health and Safety Executive and one of the environment agencies
title: Control of major accident hazards notification
